author: dantraMSFT
body: This change removes the stub assembly for MMI.Native replacing it with a nuget package containing binaries from the Windows Build including: MI.dll, MI.pdb Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.dll and .pdb Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.Unmanaged.dll and pdb The nuspec and associated binaries are in the Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native repository and the package is checked into the psl-windows-build repository. I'm expecting to update the package at least once more when the final binaries are chosen for the PowerShell package. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/950)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@dantraMSFT I rebased the branch onto master again to pull in the package updates, which pin the `dotnet-test-xunit` package, which should resolve the errant xUnit test runner failure.

You'll want to `git fetch && git reset origin/andschwa/dsc` to get updated.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Yup, that did it. Merging. I'll resolve PowerShell/psl-windows-build/pull/12 too.

title: Use nuget package for MI.dll, MMI.Native.dll and MMI.Native.Unmanaged.dll
